projects.title: BetMax
description: âš½ BetMax is a TypeScript CLI tool that finds value bets in football player markets.
It works by scraping current player statistics and applies Poisson distribution models to calculate fair odds for player markets.
The tool then compares these predictions against live bookmaker odds, generating a spreadsheet of opportunities ranked by Expected Value (EV) to identify mathematically advantageous bets.
So far this season, I'm up 73% by following the opportunities identified by BetMax!
